I congratulate the people of the UAE and all the Arab and Islamic peoples by the holy month of Ramadan .. God has returned to us and you have good and blessings
Ramadan is an opportunity for all of us .. an opportunity to do good .. an opportunity to reflect .. an opportunity to communicate .. and an opportunity to renew our energies for the whole year ..

I hope that our Arab and Islamic peoples will benefit from the spirit of the holy month in spreading the spirit of tolerance and reconciliation and promoting the great Islamic values ​​that unite us all
In the occasion of Ramadan, I sincerely wish the UAE citizens and all the Muslims across the world a blessed and joyful month.
Ramadan is a great chance for doing good, reconnecting with one another and refueling our spirits ..
I hope that the Arab and the Islamic world tune to our great Islamic values ​​of tolerance and reconciliation that Ramadan reminds us of
Best congratulations by the holy month of Ramadan, calling upon Almighty God to restore it to you and your family and love you for health, happiness, tranquility and success.
Best wishes to all our Moslem brothers and sisters as they mark the beginning of the holy month of #Ramadan.

Despite all our calls, warnings and injustice in the world of Islam and the world continues to blaze the fast pace.
The events in Egypt will unfortunately lead to serious complications in terms of the development of the region.
They showed us Tahrir Square for days. The demonstrations in Tahrir Square do not legitimize a coup.
If the signs are an indication, then where are you going to put the Avenue of Admissions?
We are talking about Turkey from a very clear point of view, no matter who is in power, every blow is illegitimate.
In the past, the military troops were going out on the streets, declaring martial law, television, radio channels.
Today, media, social media are preparing ground for illegal shows and the Armed Forces can come after him.
There is a point where these projects do not add up. If they have a trap, Allah has a trap. The peoples also have a trap.
They can take social media, international forces behind them. But a nation's prayer is enough to upset all these traps.
